comment: Hallelujah ! The Lord asked me to repot / arrange the plants I have in my apartment , just noticed myself doin it after a while . There's this one pot that I planted a sweet potato in it months ago ; leaves and branches are already withered as I've had - day out of the city vacation <URL>

                  :mod (j / just)))

                  :ARG2 a3
                  :time (b / before

                                    :unit (m3 / month)))))
            :mod (t2 / this))
      :snt4 (w2 / wither-01

                  :ARG0 (v / vacation-01

                        :duration t
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (d2 / day)))))

comment: I thought it's not bearing anything so I've decided to remove and throw the withered leaves and branches including the roots . And it surprised me that I found a small sweet potato ! The Lord told / reminded me that when you thought you're not bearing any fruit whenever
amr:
